title: Senior Scientist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich)
Interview Descriptions: Initial 30 minutes 1:1 interview with the professor followed up by a half day interview consisting of several 1:1s with most of the future colleagues and a 30min presentation with 20min questions and answers. Follow up short discussions and negotiation. Overall it took three months from first contact to accepting the offer.
Interview Questions: Describe your experience with and expertise in scRNAseq analysis.

title: Predoctoral Fellow Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: 1. introduce your own edu bg 2. some questions about research experiece & behavioural questions (e.g. what is your bigest mistake in your academic career / do you have any anecdote in your previous research experience) 3. technical questions (including your coding experience and an RCT question) and ask questions if you want
Interview Questions: what is your bigest mistake in your academic career / do you have any anecdote in your previous research experience

title: Post Doctoral Researcher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Universität Zürich
Interview Descriptions: Straightforward process. Questions about former positions and papers. Asked me to present the piece of research I found most interesting during my career in front of the entire research group. Very open environment, good questions and very good atmosphere overall.
Interview Questions: How do you manage your students?

title: E-Learning Mitarbeiter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: Es fanden insgesamt 4 Gespräche für eine Stelle an der Universität Zürich im Bereich E-Learning Support statt. 1. Kennenlernen des direkten Vorgesetzten 2. Testaufgabe lösen + weitere Fragen zur Person/Stelle 3. Kennenlernen des Teams 4. Abschlussgespräch mit HR Grundsätzlich waren die Gespräche sehr angenehm. Allerdings ist man sehr enttäuscht, wenn man nach dem 4. Gespräch jeweils viel positiven Input von den Interviewern erhalten hat und trotzdem abgelehnt wird.
Interview Questions: Was sind Ihre schwächen? Sehen Sie sich als Teamplayer? Warum wollen Sie an der Universität in Zürich arbeiten?

title: IT Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Universität Zürich in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions: First I got in touch with the IT-Manager in order to arrange an Interview (get to know each other). HR was involved later afterwards. Overall the Recruiting Process was transparent and reasonable.
Interview Questions: How do you manage stress? How do you manage dificult team members?

title: Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Universität Zürich
Interview Descriptions: Grundsätzlich angenehm. An der Probevorlesung gab es keine Studierenden. Nur die Hälfte der anwesenden Personen hat Fragen gestellt. Universität bemüht sich, den Frauenanteil zu erhöhen, leichter als Frau eine Stelle zu erhalten. Die Dauer war ca. 2* eine Stunde, Probevorlesung und Interview mit der Kommission. Ca. 20 Personen waren anwesend. Anwensende Personen hatten sich soweit ersichtlich mit meiner Bewerbung auseinandergesetzt.
Interview Questions: Warum interessieren Sie sich für die Universität Zürich?

title: Phd Interview Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: PhD interview for the MIM program. It was an online interview with 3 PIs to get accepted into the program and afterwards the individual interview with the PIs that offered a position.
Interview Questions: Why would you want to pursue a PhD at UZH?

title: MasterProject Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Zuerst eine mail wo man sich vorstellt und die Interesse zeigt (Webseite der Forschungsgruppe gut lesen), dann meeting wo man sich vorstellt. Fragen von vorherige Erfahrungen werden auch gefragt aber sind nicht erforderlich
Interview Questions: Wieso wollen Sie hier kommen?

title: Doktorand Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: Das Vorstellungsgespräch lief aufgeteilt auf mehrere Gespräche unkompliziert und freundlich ab. Erst ein erstes Kennenlernen, bei weiteren Gesprächen wurden die Fragen intensivierter und konkreter. Wenn man ehrliches Interesse signalisiert und sich bereit zeigt, Arbeit zu leisten, kann fast nichts schief gehen, natürlich bei geeignetem Profil und Kenntnissen. Sehr menschlich, zuvorkommend, wohlwollend, ohne Probleme. Weiterempfehlenswert,
Interview Questions: Was haben sie in ihrem vorherigen Job gemacht?

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Universität Zürich
Interview Descriptions: My interlocutor put me at ease from the beginning. He was interested in my experiences, not only professional but also personal, and this was good for me because it created a pleasant environment.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself and your past experience

title: Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Universität Zürich in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Smooth process, very personal and efficient. Met the whole team and got prompt follow up invite. Very professional setting and procedure. They waited quote long to provide the final feedback, had to call myself despite their promise to get on touch soon.
Interview Questions: Motivation was a focus in the interview process.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Discussion for my CV and job for 30 minutes and tour to the lab. Ask me question about my future goals etc. Nice people and environment, willing to hear me and easy to talk with.
Interview Questions: What kind of research I have done already?

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: The process took three months, from the submission of the first application to the interview days. Before arriving to zurich you will have to choose the PI  that you want to work with and they will organise interviews for you. Before getting to this step however you have to "pass" a presentation in front of a committee that will mark your admission to the program. You only get a position if you also get a match with the PI.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose zurich/this PhD program?

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Universität Zürich in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: Ein Gespräch mit der Teamleiterin, und ein Gespräch mit 2 Semesterassistenten aus dem Team. Beide Gespräche sehr angenehm. Beim Gespräch mit der Teamleiterin wurden viele Fragen gestellt, beim anderen konnte man selbst auch viele Fragen stellen um die Stelle besser zu verstehen.
Interview Questions: Wie gehst du mit Problemen und Herausforderungen um? Wie gehst du mit Deadlines um?

title: Postdoctoral Researcher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: First I had a Skype interview with the Prof and group leader, which was followed by on site presentation and discussion. All group members attended, asked some questions. I had a chance to talk to a few members, and they showed me the labs.
Interview Questions: mainly talked about science, quizzed me on the techniques from the job description. Discussed responsibilities, my motivation.

title: PhD Graduate Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich
Interview Descriptions: Applied for an advertised position by sending CV, Cover letter, articles, educational certificates. Participating in a mostly scientific interview (plus some personality questions) with a group of scientists in the same field.
Interview Questions: questions about past research experience

title: Post Doc Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich)
Interview Descriptions: Met the boss followed by the group. They explained their research and asked me questions about mine. I also presented my work to the whole institute and answered their questions.
Interview Questions: Nothing out the blue questions where related to my research and future plans.

title: Project Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Universität Zürich
Interview Descriptions: The hiring processes consisted in 1 phone call, 2 interviews with 3 people on 1 day of about 30 minutes and 1 hour each, afterwards I was shown the laboratory and I met the people working there. After this I discussed briefly my salary expectations with the responsible. 2 days after they called me for a 1 day on site trial.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself.
 Why would you like to work here?
What is your experience in A<B<C

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: Presentation of your master thesis, after the ppt a lot of questions regarding your work and why do you want to come here ecc. The next days lab visits where you talk to professors and try to make them like you. In the end you submit a preference list and so do them, if you match you have the position!
Interview Questions: Things about your thesis work and why do you want to come here or why a phd and so on.

title: Laboratory Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Universität Zürich in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Applied directly to the laboratory, not through the UZH wide application. Rather general interview process. Met current employees of the group as well as the group leader. Online and on site evaluations.
Interview Questions: About my previous work experience and studies. About my research interests and career ideas.

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Anfangs eine fünf minütige Power Point Presentation mit kurzer Diskussionsrunde. Danach hatte ich Einzelgespräche mit den Gruppenmitgliedern und einen Rundgang in den Laborräumen, zuletzt mit dem Gruppenleiter ein letztes und vertiefendes Gespräch.
Interview Questions: Wieso ist genau dieses Thema interessant für dich? Was möchtest du in den nächsten 5 Jahren erreicht haben?

title: PhD Candidate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: I was invited to Zürich for a visiting day and two interviews. One interview with the DGS, and the second with another faculty member. Both interviews were meant for them to decide whether to give me funding for the PhD or not. Both interviews were friendly, mostly about my research ideas. Eventually I obtained the funding.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply to the University of Zurich for a PhD?

title: Postdoc-Wissenschaftler Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: One to one interview with the group leader and the team member. Exciting introduction to the research opportunities and development. Official and unofficial requirements. Family-friendly environment. Flexibility of working time.
Interview Questions: Professional and personal statement

title: Wissenschaftlicher Mitarbeiter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Erste Auswahl über den Lebenslauf (die Liste der Veröffentlichungen ist wichtig, um diesen Schritt zu überstehen).

Die zweite Auswahl erfolgt über ein Gespräch über Skype. Das dritte und letzte Gespräch (in den meisten Fällen wird man dann angenommen) ist eine persönliche Begegnung.
Interview Questions: Sie fragen nach dem Promotionsvorhaben. Man muss genau sagen, was man vorhat, wenn man in dieser Umgebung arbeitet.

title: PhD Student/Scientific Employee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: We had a general conversation about my research proposal and some 15 minutes about me personality. The conversation did not go really deep. As it was an application to a chair, it was mostly about adressing the professor's interest. The team had nothing to say but the decision is purely a one man show.
Interview Questions:
- Where do you want to publish?
- Do you have any data for this project?
- In what direction do you want to develop during your PhD?

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Mar 2014
Interview Descriptions: After sending my CV, I had a skype call and then a visit at the University of Zurich where I gave a presentation and I had a meeting with different group members
Interview Questions: my experience and my motivation

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: I had a phone call and an interview over Skype. I had to present my general research plan for the nex few years. Besides that it was mostly small talk.
Interview Questions: What is your research focus?

title: PhD Candidate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: In one hand, I had a phone call to talk about my motivations and my background. In second hand, i was selected to come and visit the institute, meet the group and discuss the project.
Interview Questions: Why do you think you are the best candidate for this job?

title: Scientific Associate In Core Facility Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Interview was relatively short since I knew the head through previous projects. I was practically invited to apply. Usually, the easiest way to get a positionis through personal contacts and recommendations.
Interview Questions: Can you start right away?

title: PhD Graduate Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: easy, brief, 2 skype calls with two different people. On-site tour of the lab. Nothing special to add, it was easy, just getting to know the people and the lab. I asked the questions rather then the other way around.
Interview Questions: almost nothing

title: Biologe Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: Wie oben beschrieben - Telefon 1:1 und eine Präsentation vor der Gruppe.
Interview Questions: Vorstellungsgespräch mit der Personalabteilung

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Oct 2011
Interview Descriptions: After applying directly to my future professor, I was invited for a face to face interview. The flight and the hotel where covered by the institute. Before the interview, I was shown how the institute is run (secretaries, dean etc.), after the interview I got to know me future colleagues. The interview itself lasted about an hour and I was told more about the prospective job than asked about my own capabilities. One week after my interview, I received a positive answer and was directed to our secretary to take care of the formalities.
Interview Questions: There where no specific questions, just a general description of what my project would be like.

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Sept 2011
Interview Descriptions: All interviewees were invited to Zurich. They were paid for the flight and hotel costs. Each interviewee was interviewed by a panel of professors. Then if any member of the panel was interested in any student, they would offer him / her a place in their lab. The student would have a choice to choose any lab he / she has been offered.
Interview Questions: The asked for a short presentation of previous research

title: Postdoc-Wissenschaftler Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Jul 2009
Interview Descriptions: Einladung zu einem Laborbesuch und einer Präsentation meiner früheren Arbeit, zwei Tage mit Kollegen verbracht
Interview Questions: Würden Sie gerne über ein anspruchsvolles Thema sprechen?

title: Doktorant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Universität Zürich (Zürich) in Jul 2009
Interview Descriptions:
1. Bewerbung über eine internationale PhD-Programm-Website/ Direkter Kontakt zu dem Professor, für den ich mich interessierte
2. Abschicken meines Lebenslaufs sowie einer Beschreibung der Arbeit, die man gerne in ihrem Labor verrichten würde.
3. Der Lebenslauf sollte spezifische akademische Interessen in Form von Veröffentlichungen oder bereits getaner Forschungsarbeit zeigen. 4. Das Komitee oder die Professoren wählen den Lebenslauf anhand ihres Bedarfs und danach aus, wie gut man zu der Stelle passt.
5. Man wird eingeladen, seine Arbeit der Gruppe oder einem ausgewählten Komitee zu präsentieren

6. Wenn beiderseitiges Interesse besteht, folgt die Einladung das Team zu treffen und ein informelles Gespräch über die Arbeit.
7. Das Team informiert den Chef/Supervisor darüber, wie gut man passt und ob sie mit einem Neuankömmling arbeiten könnten.

8. Wenn alles passt, werden akademische Zertifikate, Notenbögen etc. angefordert und ein formeller Brief verschickt.
Interview Questions: Erzählen Sie uns mehr über relevante Daten aus Ihrer These, wie würden Sie mit diesen Forschungen fortfahren?
